participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them. I love fishing. I am blind and my family are my eyes. I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art. My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I enjoy watching my favorite childhood cartoons. Driving in the countryside is a pastime. I wish I could write in cursive, but I am a resourceful individual who can adapt to any situation. I like meat. My family members are all very supportive of my career as a teacher.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to?
Not much just watching some cartoons, what about you?
I am actually working on a piece of cosplay gear, it is for a character from a video game.
Oh that sounds cool, I love cosplay. Do you have any pets?
No I don't, I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
I'm sorry to hear that, I love my pets. They're like my family.
Well I'm glad you have some furry friends to keep you company.
Yeah they're great company, I just wish I could bring them to work with me sometimes.
Yeah I know what you mean, I wish I could bring my cosplay gear to work with me.
Haha yeah that would be awesome.
Well I'm going to get back to work on my gear, have a great day!
